title: Vuelta a España stage 8: Sepp Kuss roars into red jersey, Primož Roglič strikes for stage win
content:
Kuss claims career-first grand tour GC leader's jersey, Evenepoel resilient under Jumbo-Visma pressure but misses sprint victory.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España stage 8: Sepp Kuss roars into red jersey, Primož Roglič strikes for stage win on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
